title: Chasing Dopamine
description: Katie and The Union dodge a question about zoom trivia before diving into a vast sea of sports news. Chris Paul in the Protocol (41:55), Lebron’s tweets about NBA injuries (59:40), Reggie Miller’s terrible take (1:07:35), MLB goop (1:24:20), Ronaldo’s water supremacy (1:55:00), a late WCWS update (2:08:00), a very messy slip n slide (2:11:12), and more. Lastly: a question about hiding things from your family (2:21:05).
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie and The Union chat about the NBA, MLB's stick situation and more
